'''Necrophilia''' according to the ''[[Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders]]'', is a [[paraphilia]] characterized by a [[human sexuality|sexual]] attraction to [[corpse]]s. It comes from Greek words meaning "love of the dead".
+
'''Necrophilia''' according to the ''[[Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders]]'', is a [[Sexual orientation]] characterized by a [[human sexuality|sexual]] attraction to [[corpse]]s. It comes from Greek words meaning "love of the dead".
Figuratively, the term "necrophilia" describes an inordinate desire to control another person, usually in the context of a [[romantic]] or interpersonal relationship; the accusation is that the person is so interpersonally controlling as to be better-suited to relationships with nonresponsive people.
Figuratively, the term "necrophilia" describes an inordinate desire to control another person, usually in the context of a [[romantic]] or interpersonal relationship; the accusation is that the person is so interpersonally controlling as to be better-suited to relationships with nonresponsive people.
